ModMetaData.name: Live With The Pain
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/Self-Info.png[/img]
Injuries that gets permanent and causes permanent pain will now get less painful over time. Pawns learn to cope with it and will feel less pain as time goes by.
[list] [*] After five days pain is reduced to 75% [*] After a quandrum the pain is reduced to 50% [*] After a year the pain is reduced further to 25% [/list]
Mod-settings [list] [*] When the three changes occur [*] What pain levels they should give [*] Making pain worse in rain/snow (+100%) [*] Making pain worse in lower than seasonal average temperature (+100%) [*] Making pain worse after waking up (+100% and falling with rest-level) [/list]
Safe to add and remove from saves
Idea by: SkeleMax
